comments:
In my plugin, I regularly query for a file's content description by calling IFile.getContentDescription(). I am consistently seeing this npe:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.computeChildren(ProjectPreferences.java:576)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.<init>(ProjectPreferences.java:112)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.internalCreate(ProjectPreferences.java:188)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.preferences.EclipsePreferences.create(EclipsePreferences.java:288)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.preferences.EclipsePreferences.internalNode(EclipsePreferences.java:549)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.preferences.EclipsePreferences.node(EclipsePreferences.java:683)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectContentTypes.usesContentTypePreferences(ProjectContentTypes.java:113)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ContentDescriptionManager.getDescriptionFor(ContentDescriptionManager.java:293)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.File.getContentDescription(File.java:276)
	at com.bea.wlw.webservices.core.util.WebServiceUtil.isWebService(WebServiceUtil.java:143)

This was fixed in 3.2.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 108869 ***
